title: Emerging-Market Stocks, Currencies Add to Rally in Quiet Session
description: Emerging-market assets added to their recent advances on Friday amid thin holiday trading, as investor sentiment remained bullish heading into the year-end.
content: Emerging-market assets added to their recent advances on Friday amid thin holiday trading, as investor sentiment remained bullish heading into the year-end.
